entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early in the evening. Wind becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
